objdescid.compdate: c. 1780The date is based on stylistic considerations.

provenance.name: Yale Center for British Art
provenance.note: Probably inherited from Blake by his wife Catherine upon his death in 1827; probably acquired by Frederick Tatham upon Catherine Blake's death in 1831; sold anonymously, Sotheby's, 29 April 1862, in lot 167 with three other works by Blake (11s. to the dealer H. Palser); probably Francis Cunningham; sold Sotheby's, 11 May 1876, lot 650 (£2 to Thompson, probably a dealer); Theodore Lucas by 1906; Iolo A. Williams; his son, Edward Williams, probably by inheritance in 1962; sold to, or placed on consignment with, the dealer P. & D. Colnaghi in 1966; sold by Colnaghi, c. 1966, to Paul Mellon and his wife, Rachel Lambert Mellon; given by Mr. and Mrs. Mellon to the Yale Center for British Art in 1975.

illustration.illusobjdesc: Facing forward with head raised, Moses raises both arms vertically to hold the stone tablet of the law above his head. He has curly hair and a long beard and wears a long gown beneath which both bare feet are visible. Moses appears to stand on a stone atop what may be grassy ground. The tablet he holds has a dividing line at center and portions of the tablet at left are obscured by a dark cloud in the upper left corner of the design. A larger, lighter cloud is visible in the center of the background. Additional fog or smoke appears below this cloud in the lower half of the design.

component.illusobjdesc: Facing forward with head raised, Moses raises both arms vertically to hold the stone tablet of the law above his head. He has curly hair and a long beard and wears a long gown beneath which both bare feet are visible. Moses appears to stand on a stone atop grassy ground.

The central figure Moses holds the stone tablet of the law above his head. The tablet has a dividing line at center and portions of the tablet at left are obscured by a dark cloud in the upper left corner of the design.

component.characteristic: The central figure Moses appears to stand on a stone. The dark coloring of the earth beneath the stone may suggest grass or earth.
The central figure Moses appears to stand on a stone. The dark coloring of the earth beneath the stone may suggest grass or earth.

component.illusobjdesc: A dark cloud in the upper left corner obscures portions of the stone tablets at left. A larger, lighter cloud is visible in the sky in the center of the background. Additional fog or smoke appears below this cloud in the lower half of the design.
